item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine accounts maintenance
item.description:
Feb 6, 20:39 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 6, 20:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 5, 20:22 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 06/02/2024 20:00 UTC
End time : 06/02/2024 21:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, at one point, a short downtime of no more than 10 minutes will be experienced. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on account service. This maintenance is expected to not have impact on the projects: no downtime, no performance issue are expected.

item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster003/Cluste005/Cluster006/Cluster007/Cluster010/Cluster030
item.description:
Feb 6, 13:00 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 05/02/2024 10:40 UTC
End time : 05/02/2024 11:50 UTC
Service impact : Customer could have encountered some latencies or unavailability on websites hosted on Cluster003, Cluste005, Cluster006, Cluster007, Cluster010 and Cluster030.
Root cause : Overload on storage equipment
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Feb 6, 12:05 UTC
Monitoring - No more impact is being observed on Cluster003, Cluste005, Cluster006, Cluster007, Cluster010 and Cluster030.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation

Feb 6, 11:44 UTC
Update - Customers whose websites are hosted in Cluster030 may also encounter latencies or unavailability.

Feb 6, 11:27 UTC
Update - Customers whose websites are hosted in Cluster005 may also encounter latencies or unavailability.

Feb 6, 11:15 UTC
Update - No more impact is being observed on Cluster010.
Our teams are currently working to solve the issue for the remaining clusters

Feb 6, 11:09 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 05/02/2024 10:40 UTC
Service impact : Customer can encounter some latencies or unavailability on websites hosted on Cluster003, Cluster006, Cluster007 and Cluster010
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine accounts maintenance
item.description:
Feb 5, 20:10 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 5, 17:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 5, 11:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 05/02/2024 17:00 UTC
End time : 05/02/2024 19:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade. Our partner will be performing a routine maintenance to optimize performance service on Accounts. This maintenance is expected to impact performance for Accounts services, including the Console, User Accounting, Provisioning and Billing, although, services will remain available at all times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on account service. This maintenance is expected to not have impact on the projects: no downtime, no performance issue are expected.
